channel.title: [317 PI] Turn funpk into drop items on death
channel.description: I want FunPk to drop items on death instead of you keeping everything. I relocated FunPk to outside my home. When you attack in funpk you get skulled and all just like in wild, but i'd like items to be dropped like in wild too.

item.title: [317 PI] Turn funpk into drop items on death
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

How exactly is that fun pk? funpk is supposed to be pking without the risk…
What you’re saying you added is a pk box…
And for a solution, search for c.inFunPk() or c.inFunPk in PlayerAssistant.
It’ll be in either giveLife or applyDead.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 PI] Turn funpk into drop items on death

item.title: [317 PI] Turn funpk into drop items on death
item.dc:creator: @Monthly1 Monthly-
item.description:
@Monthly1 wrote:

I’m learning to code at the moment so i won’t be able to help fix this but!

Search “Rsps pi funpk” Or something like that, And you should see one saying “How to add funpk” Just go on it and look for the part where they add the death part your trying to fix!

Sorry i’f this doesn’t work!
